name: Yanone: Letter Splatter
description: Yanone immerses you in a quirky environment where the fast-paced action requires you to be on your guard at all times.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 4590 3.3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 750 OR AMD Radeon R7 265 2GB Storage: 110 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 4590 3.3GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon Pro 580 Storage: 110 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
